mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, title, markdown, location_name, lat, lng, cover_url, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{markdown}, #{locationName}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{coverUrl}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, title, markdown, location_name, lat, lng, cover_url, create_time FROM post ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 100
SELECT id, user_id, title, markdown, location_name, lat, lng, cover_url, create_time FROM post WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
